attributes.additional_details: Gambling addiction is a very big problem. There are many suicide cases linked to gambling  and I don't think it should be something that is promoted on a daily basis.
attributes.background: I want gambling adverts to be banned from tv, radio and social media.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Review current legislation and regulation of gambling adverts
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700323
